section.name: Project Information
section.description: This section contains general project info for this project.

setting.name: Project Name
setting.description: The name of the current project the system is processing.

setting.name: Project Creation Date
setting.description: The date this project was created.

setting.name: Creator Identification
setting.description: The ID of the user who created this project.

setting.name: Rapuma Creator Version
setting.description: The version of Rapuma that last worked with, or created this project.

setting.name: Project Title
setting.description: This is the actual title that will go on the book cover.

setting.name: Project Translators
setting.description: The name of the author or translators for this publication.

setting.name: Project Typesetters
setting.description: The names of the typesetter(s) for this project.

setting.name: ISBN Number
setting.description: The ISBN identification number if this project has one.

setting.name: Language Code
setting.description: The ISO/Ethnolouge langage code for the primary language of this publication.

setting.name: Script Code
setting.description: The ISO writing system code for the primary language of this publication.

setting.name: Publication Start Date
setting.description: The date this publication was started.

setting.name: Publication Finish Date
setting.description: The date this publication was finished.

setting.name: Turn On Hyphenation
setting.description: Turn on the use of hyphenation when rendering groups that have been specified for this project. The default is True but it can be turned off in case debugging or some kind of testing is needed.

section.name: Project Backup Information
section.description: This section contains information about project backup routines like cloud pushes, backups, templates and archives.

setting.name: Owner Identification
setting.description: The user ID code of the owner of the backup data. Only one user can own a project at a time.

setting.name: Owner Identification
setting.description: A time stamp of when the project was last pushed to the cloud.

section.name: General Settings
section.description: This section contains miscellaneous global settings and operational information for the project.

setting.name: Last Edit on the Config File
setting.description: A time stamp of when the project config was last edited.
